website_summaries.verdict: Sourced from small family fishermen, this product comes with 10 individually packaged fillet strips.
pros: High in protein and low in calories, with a beef jerky-like texture and a complementary maple flavor
cons: Minimal complaints about flavor and texture

customer_reviews.title: A rubbery disaster
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago, my entire family was obsessed with these. They had a sweet salmon flavor, that tasted fresh. I can’t believe I bought 20 of these. There has DEFINITELY been a change. These are inedible. They taste rubbery, processed and horrible. I think I read that EPIC was bought by General Mills (??) well, that would make sense in the change in product. It’s just sad. EPIC sold out (which I understand) but they didn’t even care about maintaining the integrity of the product. Sucks for the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Striving4zen

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good but not anymore!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Revised from a 5 to a 1. Quality of this product has plummeted. We liked the flavor of these but starting about 2 months ago, we noticed the sticks were shorter and so much more oil. Like oil squirts across the room when you bite it. I reached out to EPIC but they never responded. I gave the product another chance (we had these on auto ship but I’ve cancelled that) hoping it was a bad batch. Nope. This batch had open packages, oil jerky sticks, and best of all one was covered in mold.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved meat jerky since I was a kid and this is the first time that I tried a fish jerky. WOW! It’s much softer than the meat products and the flavor is awesome. Just enough salmon flavor without being over fishy. Honestly I think that I could eat a dozen in one sitting but I limit it to one a day. If you like salmon but hate the over fishy aromas then you will love it. The maple flavor is not overpowering either. Just enough to enhance the salmon but you don’t feel like your drinking maple syrup .
customer_reviews.author: Alexander W.  Kulischenko

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged fish meat
customer_reviews.text: This is so disgusting and poorly packaged. I ordered $50 worth of this jerky because my friend said it was delicious and healthy and there is already mold all over them. Thanks for wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Byran Washington

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and after taste.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this, because I get tuna jerky I absolutely love. I'll make this short, as much as I love and eat salmon all the time. I'll never purchase this again. It had an extreme stinky fishy smell and horrible after taste. I bought a box of 10, and even the guys at work, would take one bite and be done with it. I consider myself an adventurous eater. I'll never purchase these jerky sticks again, nor should you.
customer_reviews.author: jason campbell

customer_reviews.title: Loved the texture
customer_reviews.text: trying to diet and feeling deprived..... then this arrived at my door! Instant fix for that vague craving that I was feeling. Loved the texture, taste, - just the right amount of sweet, and it was filling and At 100 calories it was just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: RubyS

customer_reviews.title: Horrific
customer_reviews.text: I am appalled by how bad tasting these are. The texture is grainy and dry, but they are also somehow oily and slick in your mouth. They have an overbearing sweet flavor (probably from the maple) with an unpleasant undertone of fish. I am someone who loves fish, especially salmon, but these are absolutely awful. All of the products from Epic Provisions that I have tried are terrible. I cannot emphasize enough how much I regret eating every one of their products, especially these salmon ones.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: If you like chewing on a fisherman's boot...
customer_reviews.text: ...then this is the product for you. I had to stop during the first bite after my jaw dislocated from repetitive motion injury. It was like chewing on a razor strop that had been curing in mackerel juice. Salmon isn't supposed to taste THAT gamy...or that tough. It's a shame, because I've always enjoyed the other Epic products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Terd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Oily and super gross tasting
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these! My sister used to send me salmon jerky from Alaska. I ordered this product and it did not taste like anything i had before. It was super oily and had a very fishy odor. I held my nose and ate it because I hate wasting food. It tasted pretty bad and now I have nausea. Planning on donating these or composting them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Joy

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Fish Sticks
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is like canned tuna with sugar, and it smelled like something I would feed to my dog. In fact, my dog was super excited by the smell and really enjoyed the piece I gave to her. It's not overly tough, but it doesn't go any farther than breaking into smaller, rubbery pieces. It didn't seem to rehydrate, even when I took a sip of water while chewing. I doubt that this stuff will even digest properly. It really didn't taste like salmon, which is the reason someone would pay for the premium fish. On a positive note, I didn't find any bones in the one stick I tried so far. That was unsarcastically unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Buck

customer_reviews.title: I can't even describe how horrible they tasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I love salmon jerky, and Trader Joe's discontinued theirs. So I was thinking I would get something similar in stick form. DEFINITELY NOT. These were so horrible, I cannot even think of something to compare them to, all I know is that they were completely inedible. I do generally like strong/salty/smoky/fishy flavors, so it's not the fish aspect. These just tasted like drywall.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like the smoked salmon maple strips. Reading reviews, people LOVED these snacks. I'm trying to find as many low/no sugar protein snacks and decided to give these a try. I love salmon and maple so it seemed like it would be fine. While it doesn't taste super fishy, it smells super fishy. That turned me off. The consistency isn't quite a jerky but a pressed together meat. It seemed greasy. I just couldn't get past the smell and consistency. Taste wasn't bad...if you can get past the texture. Mostly I think this was ME and my mind being confused. I'm glad I tried them at least!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: really good quality salmon strips
customer_reviews.text: really good quality salmon strips. I've tried them right out of the wrapper and they are tasty enough just as they are; mixed in a salad or cooked in with Udon noddle they really add a bit of spark to a dish.
customer_reviews.author: Yosiph

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Up front, when you open a packet, there is a strong fishy odor, but it is salmon, which is kinda strong period. Great flavor, and odor does not linger. Good level of protein and low sugar. Will keep a steady order of these on hand. Great for hikes, and outdoor use. There was a rating for "thickness," which seemed odd, but this is "thick enough." Product is on average, 170mm long, 28mm wide and 5mm thick. Would love it to be cheaper, but production of a product like this is probably not easy, nor cheap. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love salmon. And I love various jerky. But this salmon is not jerky. It's salmon "ground and formed" into strips. Flavor is not too bad (salmon is not overly fishy anyway). The sweetness of the maple syrup makes it better as well. But the pressed and formed texture really negates the whole experience for me. This this is not unlike eating a fish candy bar. As a hiking or survival food this would be great when one has a real hunger going on. But to eat it just for the flavor? Nah.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: If you like Lox, you need this
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. This is a beautiful pairing of salmon, smoky BBQ and portability. If you love eating salmon on a bagel in the morning then this was made for you. The texture is perfect, the flavor is only gently fishy (it tastes/smells super fresh for preserved fish) and the BBQ is just top notch. My only complaint is its tough to open the plastic but i carry a little scissors that does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AvidTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Delicious wild caught fish jerky 7g protein
customer_reviews.text: This is best salmon jerky I've ever had! I need to get more! When you rip one open and devour it fast, but slow enough for your tastebuds to register the taste, you'll realize just how delicious these really are! So when I had first examined the package, I had expected it to be the same shape as the Venison ones, short and stocky like a rugby player, but instead, these were long & slim like a basketball player. When you tear into one, you'll notice a strong fish odor just so you know, which is to be expected. I shared a few to some of my friends and coworkers...but now I don't want to share anymore...HAHAAHAHAHA
customer_reviews.author: Dae J.  Kim

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at 19.95$ one time, and it was delicious, Just a couple weeks ago I bought this same product for 19.95$, now they want 32.50, really? that's ridiculous, Now if it was absolutely amazing, I might consider it, but the product has gone downhill, it got thinner, more oilier, and more fishy tasting, so it could be cut with something else. I would never pay 32.50 for this. Be advised on decrease in quality in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good but not my style...
customer_reviews.text: I am working my way through different salmon jerky brands. This one looked promising. I don't have anything "bad" to say about it. The flavor is ok, if a little coconut heavy, but still ok. The texture is not what I was expecting. It is a pressed jerky. I personally like the natural cut. in short, the flavor wasn't bad, the texture wasn't what I was looking for, but I will eat every last bit because I love jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pray

customer_reviews.title: Different strokes for different folks
customer_reviews.text: This sounded so tempting when I saw it online. I LOVE salmon and could eat it every day. However, I am not a "jerky" eater. What sounded like delicious seasonings turned out to be weird and I found the texture very unpleasant. Not one to want to give such an expensive treat to my dogs, I offered them to a neighbor. He loved them! I'm happy he did, but I'm not happy to have spent the money I did on them.
customer_reviews.author: Luie

customer_reviews.title: Just awful
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know why I ordered from this brand because I have tried their other meat snacks and they are just... awful... But let's talk about this product. It is immediately very fishy, the texture is not like natural salmon meat (think the difference between white meat chicken tenders and McDonald's chicken nuggets) and the flavor is just solely maple flavored. Honestly I wish I could give this product 0 stars waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erice Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Price almost doubled. What's the deal?
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care for these but my wife kind of likes them. She had them on order every few months. Now the price has shot up by 75%. What's the deal? Are you flying them in from the moon or something? If you want folks to continue buying the product, make it affordable. I now make my own Salmon Jerky in a dehydrator which tastes fantastic. A lot cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever had real salmon jerky and enjoyed it then you will be disappointed with this product. The salmon is processed and turned into a weird tasting uniform strip of fish. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but they were $3 cheaper back in June. So I’m docking it down to 3 stars and will not buy more at this inflated price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defied my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a low-cal protein boost and was fully prepared to cringe upon my first bite (even though I enjoy raw salmon). I assumed something like this would be an acquired taste, but I was dead wrong. This was delicious from start to finish. Just the right amount of maple to compliment the salmon without being too sweet. Not too chewy, and much softer than beef jerky. Your experience may vary depending on your tolerance for fish, but I did not find this to be overly fishy. I plan on buying this again and am pleasantly surprised by how well this purchase worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product on auto-ship for over a year now and I love it as part of my protein routine. I will consume a few of these sticks every day and my french bulldog always requires at least a bite. She goes into full "bacon beg mode" for a bite of Epic salmon stick. It's definitely approved by her. Depending on time of year a batch of sticks was manufactured, some variability in taste is noticeable - but that's true of most cuts of salmon. Salmon has a range of flavor. Overall great product and fairly consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Cookster

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Taste
customer_reviews.text: Product has overly coconut flavor..so much so it taste almost rancid. I purchased several boxes thinking these would make great snacks. Regrettably, can no longer tolerate the taste and can’t buy again. Beef and Bison are great however.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Some not Sealed
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 20 were not vacuum sealed. The middle one is not sealed and is a different color.
customer_reviews.author: SacBuyer

customer_reviews.title: This salmon jerky is SO wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: If I wasn't on such a limited income I'd buy 2 boxes of these every month.It is SO good...not as tough as many and it has such terrific flavor.I keep several in my purse all the time for those "just in case" moments but I find myself indulging just because they are SO darn GOOD!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie  West

customer_reviews.title: You know those regrets in life as you look back, this is one of them.
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this salmon jerky would be a great keto option, it was a great keto option for my cat. What was I thinking buying this product. It reminded my of that night of drinking cheap Tequila in TJ just to come back to SD and have the seafood omelette for breakfast. I really don't feel well after eating just half. If it was the end of the world and I had no food I would still not eat this salmon jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews
customer_reviews.text: Which said these were great, I love smoked salmon and to be fair I wouldn't have ordered these at all had I noticed the maple bit on package, too sweet, smoked salmon should speak for itself it doesn't need added flavors, won't be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Mark Or Valerie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: These are the most disgusting thing I have ever eaten. I love salmon, and I love maple syrup. However, I don't think those flavors were supposed to be together. We've eaten Epic venison and chicken sriracha jerky, which is delicious compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: LittleKel

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: I'm just too picky. I live two hours away from Brookings/Crescent City and know what real smoked salmon tastes like. This is not it. Salmon here has a different taste I like better. This is a more generic fish taste.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Taste horrible but my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love salmon and any other fish, however this is the worst. Has an odd coconut taste at the start and just nasty the rest of the way. Not a total waste because my dog loves it. Then again he licks his butt. I tried to give away at work by saying try this it's horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great, but no that filling
customer_reviews.text: Good little snacks, tastes great! But I'm a keto person, so they're not quite the type of product I would usually eat. Has slight maple taste. They aren't very thick I finished the 20 dollar box in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not as I remember.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sample at the CrossFit Games vendor expo and thought these were great but expensive at the time. Got a reasonable deal on these but I’m a bit disappointed with the flavor. These are fishy (not a bad thing) and a bit “tangy” (not a good thing) for a lack of a better word. Definitely Salmon jerky but just not as good as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: BBTLnumber6

customer_reviews.title: Really loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I think they taste great. They are just a tad sweet due to the maple, but definitely not overly sweet. They could be a bit thicker and longer for the price, but will definitely purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Quality and quantity issue - box only contained 9 strips
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find only 9 salmon strips in a box for 10. To compound the issue, the taste and texture have definitely taken a turn for the worse. This used to be my favorite jerky but it's now dry and chalky. I neglected to read the reviews before ordering as I used to get these in store at Wholefoods. Somehow these shipped versions are nasty...and can't believe I was shortchanged a strip! EPIC has definitely gone downhill - quality and taste have been patchy depending on the batch...the other meats - turkey etc are even worse. Please get back your mojo, EPIC!
customer_reviews.author: Food Forager

customer_reviews.title: Pretentiously overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Salmon is good. Great flavor and texture. The coconut oil is a good addition to flavor. Only reason I wont buy them anymore is because they are $2 each, way too much for such a small snack. At $.75-1.00 each I would buy them.
customer_reviews.author: T Sci

customer_reviews.title: Very good salmon snack
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Perfect on the go snack when you are looking for portable protein. Taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: taste was a little too sweet
customer_reviews.text: The jerky has a nice texture. Not too chewy and easy to swallow. The taste could be more smoky than sweet. I think if they made a lemon pepper salmon jerky it'd have a more appealing taste. Overall I give it a three star rating because it is still a nice snack if you are a Nutrionist type person and want to get fit or stay healthy or both. Keep improving your epic bars we still love them. I think you have to be hungry to really appreciate them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Far from tasting like Salmon. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Please, stay away from purchasing this product. There’s absolutely nothing “epic” about it. It tasted stale than anything salmon. If you are like me, and is kind of debating whether you should try it, I’m telling you it’s not worth it. At least try a different flavor/product. This one is not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tomahawk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tasty! Found at my local World Market in single serve portions and went looking for it in a bigger pack. Wish it was a bit less expensive. Makes for a great snack at work. (Bought in mid 2018, but have seen more recent reviews saying something changed.)
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: great for $2 each
customer_reviews.text: Deeeeeeeeelicious and nutritious. So good to keep in the car, your bag if you need something that is going to fill you up. good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. Thought this would be more like smoked salmon, flaky. However, it's more like ground salmon pressed into a mold. Its expensive and I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon smiles shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great dogfood
customer_reviews.text: I love smoked salmon with maple. These are strips (not filet of salmon) of ground salmon and clearly wasnt the freshest fish because i eat alot of fish but these are very fishy tasting and not very smoked or maple. These would make awsome dogfood and thats what im doing with them
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tasting processed fish meat.
customer_reviews.text: How can this be called fillet? It's just a mush of terrible tasting "meat." If you want acceptable fish jerky, go with Alaska Smokehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Enol

customer_reviews.title: This is a big no
customer_reviews.text: To fishy tasting. Was expecting more like texture of actual fish. This was a chopped up meat and made into a paste the dehydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Daniells

customer_reviews.title: Mmm... fish jerky.
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and it’s a great way to get nutrients that your only find the fish, specifically salmon, with no preparation.
customer_reviews.author: D3a1v1e

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fish....
customer_reviews.text: Smells like fish, tastes like chicken! Very greasy, maybe that’s the omega-3’s or maybe it’s just the coconut oil that makes these quite greasy and fattening.
customer_reviews.author: Shem Ishler

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully not strong maple flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about ordering this because I'm not a fan of maple flavoring, especially in my meat. I was pleasantly surprised to try it and find the maple is a subtle background flavor to the smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: these are just what I wanted. I highly recommend these. They're tasty and look appealing. My dogs love them, too. Great snack item.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack in My Working At Home - Staying Healthy During The Pandemic
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to mid-afternoon snack during the pandemic. I was looking for something healthy instead of CARBS. These taste great and are filling enough to hold me over until dinner. Healthy, taste great, great packaging that makes it just a grab, a rip, and I'm eating. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Tender, delicious, low calorie
customer_reviews.text: These salmon sticks are really delicious. They aren’t too dry and at only 100 cal each they fit right into my diet. They have the typical fishy salmon scent, because after all it is a fish stick and it’s natural. My husband doesn’t like but I don’t mind it and I don’t feel like it’s overpowering at all. These are a perfect on the go snack if you’re dieting or if you just love salmon and it’s health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Cristie N.

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Love that the can be ate on the go. High in protein, taste good. My grandkids love them. Worth the cost. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Strong fishy aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a high quality protein based snack, and Salmon is one of my favorite foods, so I gave it a try. The texture is good, first impression is good... and then the fishiness hits you. My wife, my son and myself all couldn't handle it and we find the taste to be too fishy to handle, I would not recommend the salmon sticks.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty alright
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it smells worse than it tastes. It tastes pretty alright, not as tasty as beef jerky. But also it's more tender than beef jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Adli A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Buying this way is way less expensive than buying them at the store. Join my FB group “Billie’s Finds” for more info on amazing Amazon deals!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Athanas

customer_reviews.title: Great On the Go Snack
customer_reviews.text: These are a handy snack and I try to keep a couple in my backpack for times I miss a meal. Great to grab as I’m heading out the door. They’re definitely on the sweet side and not cheap, but they’re the best salmon snacks I’ve found. I have them on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I rate these flawless because they are delicious, flavorful and addictive. I have to eat them slowly because they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelius Noslen

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. I had no idea I was buying jerkey. I thought it was legitimate smoked salmon. The taste is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: oh wow, these are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am regretting not believing the reviews. -- I had these before and thought they are good jerky. Now they tastes like sweet soy sauce flavored cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: X. Dai

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and portable!
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! I travel with these in my carry-in bag, always nice to have on hand rather than junk food!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: These smoked salmon strips are great healthy snacks. Good amount of protein and the kids like them too.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dirty

customer_reviews.title: salmon andy? save your money...
customer_reviews.text: good flavor but was not what I was expecting. came as ground up extruded flat of salty mostly like jerky flavor , very little salmon taste. would I order again? not very likely, will just stick to jerky instead.
customer_reviews.author: james clipperton

customer_reviews.title: Bad flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor isn’t that great. The sticks are very oily and hard to chew. I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olive12345

customer_reviews.title: Salmon is a Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Salmon Sharpies, a hard smoked treat I enjoyed as a youngster. These strips are not that tasty and the texture is like sectioned and formed jerky, not strips of real meat.
customer_reviews.author: hifivalue on eBay

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: These are for my dog, she won't eat any fish only this. Her hair is thick and beautiful now. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Boney

customer_reviews.title: Saw it, bought, got it.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but not quite on the mark. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice box questionable product.
customer_reviews.text: Very dry like pressed flavored saw dust. It doesn't chew like other fish jerky I've had. Its breaks and almost crumbles. I would recommend that you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection! Wholesome and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Nothing bad for you and everything good for you and absolutely delicious. If you get the larger box the price works out to only $1.50 a strip, half the price of a convenience store sandwich. EPIC - Please don’t change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebuttal to your rebuttal

customer_reviews.title: Portable protein
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the sweetness but they are good protein that is portable.
customer_reviews.author: SharonsRose13

customer_reviews.title: Overrated.
customer_reviews.text: This tasted like canned salmon. If you are looking for salmon jerky or candied salmon like you’d get in Alaska or British Columbia DO NOT order this. You will be highly disappointed. High price for lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the taste. They were just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these! We order them for him to take to preschool for his snack. We were buying them at Whole Foods before but this is a way better price.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these as a easy to take along for times when I am on the go and want to grab something quick to eat that is healthy and has protein. Love the taste and the texture.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: On point!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE. Sooo yummy, all came packaged as described. Will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Tasted Rotten
customer_reviews.text: I could not finish more than one, it was that bad.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go to purse snacks as a pescatarian with very limited diet. I would eat a whole box in one sitting if i could. Tbe sugar cobtent is surprisingly low. I never let my stock on these run low!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Delicious salmon flavor, not fishy. Good, healthy snack.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of the Epic Provisions strips. Delicious salmon flavor but not fishy. A good, healthy snack to ease a hungry spot. Handy to be able to have one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nasty - better off as a dog treat
customer_reviews.text: oily and gross flavor. consistency and smell reminded me of a dog treat.
customer_reviews.author: deltaman

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are worth 2 bucks a strip. Great flavor change during a week on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Snack Treat
customer_reviews.text: Everyone Got a treat in their stocking. Great taste and energy booster.
customer_reviews.author: debra banks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bad. I ate one of these after having eaten some Costco smoked salmon. This product was bland...almost like flavored cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: splash1234

customer_reviews.title: Salmon is sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love the venison ones so I thought I'd try the salmon but they are a little too sweet for me. They aren't so sweet I won't eat them but I don't plan on buying more of the salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog will not even smell of this.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike all, High price for product that dog will not even smell.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful,but don’t get it.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic but once you get it you want to buy more . It is extremely scrumptious and before I knew it I finished the box off.
customer_reviews.author: ][Chance][

customer_reviews.title: I know it's fish, but it's very fishy.
customer_reviews.text: I love fish, but this was a bit tooo fishy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: My son tried this salmon strip at a friend's home, and it quickly becomes my son's favorite snack. It's also very healthy, unlike most other snacks. I think I'll keep buying these salmon strips.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and satisfying. I was a bit skeptical after reading all the reviews but was pleasantly surprised when I tried one. There wasn’t too much oil, nor was it grey and crumbly. It was in fact quite scrumptious and a perfect snack in terms of quantity and quality. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rheaa

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: These have such a good flavor. They are a great, satisfying snack because they are mostly protein and only 100 calories.
customer_reviews.author: rntkid

customer_reviews.title: Fast and healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: These taste good and are a convenient and quick snack for a new and lactating mom. I feel satisfied after eating one. My only complaint is that they are a little tough to chew.
customer_reviews.author: mom of four

customer_reviews.title: My error.
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the production more closely. Big disappointment in this product. Not much flavor compared to salmon jerky from Seattle area. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Chopped it up and mixed it in with brown rice vermicelli and veggies and omg 🤤
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mama

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: These are good! Delicious salmon taste with just a hint of sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was expecting something a little bit better from Alaska kind of dry
customer_reviews.author: S.T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You’ve changed smoked salmon jerky..
customer_reviews.text: Man I got these maybe 6 months ago and they were terrific loved them perfect taste but ordered again and was very thrown off by the different color and when I opened it made my whole house reek of a odd cat food smell definitely would not recommend this now
customer_reviews.author: Jake bell

customer_reviews.title: Too dry
customer_reviews.text: Much dryer than the ones i bought in the convenience store. They've been discontinued there so was happy to see them here, but was sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Mead

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, easy to pack and eat for a quick protein source. Like anything else I'm sure more salt and sugar would make it tastier, but less healthy. I'll stick with these!
customer_reviews.author: Toastfactor

customer_reviews.title: Muhc better in stores
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a bad or older batch but these are not the salmon jerky that I love to get in stores. These were dryer and not as tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Camper

product_meta.title: EPIC Smoked Salmon Strips, Wild Caught, 10 Count Box 0.8oz strips
product_meta.description: Size:0.8 Ounce (Pack of 10)Salmon is a sustainable source of healthy protein and fats with an undeniably satisfying flavor. Made with wild-caught Alaskan salmon from the famous Bristol Bay region, EPIC Provisions Salmon Fillet Strips are complemented with maple sugar, dill, and onion powder to form an exquisite portable snack. Caught by small family fishermen, the salmon used in these strips enjoy nutritious diets high in ocean plankton and open range swimming that is consistent with how the species has evolved.
feature_bullets: PROTEIN SNACK: a snack strip for when you're on the go featuring 100% wild caught salmon with 7 grams of protein per serving
CONVENIENT: Grab a snack strip to keep you fueled as you're out running errands
HEALTHY SNACK: Certified Gluten-Free, Paleo friendly
CONTAINS: 10 Count Box of 0.8oz snack strips
